title: Unhinged: Exposing Liberals Gone Wild
description: Exposing Liberals Gone Wild is Michelle Malkin's unrestrained and uncensored expos√© of hate-mongering Leftists. With wit, wisdom, and a bullet-proof vest, Malkin ruthlessly and raucously skewers the myths of liberal tolerance, peace, and civility while responding to the incendiary insults and vile slurs directed at her and other conservatives. With infuriating details that are not for the faint of heart, Malkin chronicles the bizarre world of foaming-at-the-mouth Leftists in their natural the mainstream media, academia, Hollywood, and Washington.
author: Michelle Malkin
